forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low 44F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low near 40F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
